topics.body:
Actually banning guns altogether would be a terrible idea. Legalized guns are all recorder and accounted for while guns acquired via questionable means(which would increase in number int he black market the moment gun ban is enabled) are a lot more difficult to track.

a crime committed with a legally procured firearm is better than one committed with black market guns. With legal firearms is easier to pinpoint the owner of the gun and find the guy who did it.

2)Titanic at $2.186 billion
3)Jurassic World at $1.522 billion
4)Avengers at $1.520 billion
